author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mahindra And Mahindra Says Orizonte Business Solutions, Resfeber Labs Approve Merger Scheme
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - Mahindra And Mahindra Ltd:
* BOARD OF ORIZONTE BUSINESS SOLUTIONS AND RESFEBER LABS APPROVED SCHEME OF MERGER TO MERGE ORIZONTE INTO RESFEBER
* ORIZONTE BUSINESS SOLUTIONS OR SMARTSHIFT WILL CEASE TO BE CO’S SUBSIDIARY​
* SAYS ‍CO'S SHAREHOLDING IN RESFEBER LABS OR PORTER WILL BE 30.9 PERCENT OF SHARE CAPITAL​ Source text: bit.ly/2pQjN8O Further company coverage:
